transcript:
Customer: Haan ji madam.
Executive: Haan sir, aapke isi whatsapp pe na humne link share kiya hai. Aap link pe tap karke join kariye video meeting.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: Haan dekhiye link aapke whatsapp mein bheja hai humne abhi.
Customer: Whatsapp pe jaaye na?
Executive: Haan whatsapp pe jaiye.
Customer: Theek, theek.
Customer: Whatsapp khol diya.
Executive: Haan whatsapp khol diya na aapne. Abhi humne aapko message kiya tha ki aapne Ruchi naam se aur niche link hai.

Customer: To whatsapp to khol diya hai.
Executive: To whatsapp yahi hai na aapka last mein number hai 431.
Customer: Haan, haan.
Executive: To usi pe dekhiye link ek kya hoga us pe usi link pe aap us pe press karein.
Customer: Link.
Customer: Link aapne jo bheja hai.
Hmm.


Customer: Khula?
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Okay sir.


Customer: Whatsapp kholenge tab na hum, kahan khula hai?
Customer: Bhar ke rakhe hain isme kahan aaya hai?
Executive: Aapne video call kiya aur us pe link pe link pe aap tap karenge phir aap aage join, join kar payenge.
Customer: Link.
Executive: Whatsapp mein jo aapka number hai na 431 usi whatsapp mein last mein hoga 527 usi number se humne bheja hai aapko link. Ek baar phir se check kariye na.
Customer: Sir wala nahi 31 wala. To kahan aaya hai link se?
Executive: Aapne jo bheja 31 se hi bheje hai na 431.
Executive: Whatsapp pe link bheja hai aap link tap karenge tab aapko link pe aap karenge tab video meet aap join karenge.
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Whatsapp mein hi link bheji hai na?
Executive: Haan, haan whatsapp pe bheji hai. Jismein last mein jo number hai na aapka 431 usi wale pe 431 jo hai number.
Customer: Usi se baatein ho rahi hai aapse.
Executive: Haan usi pe isi number pe bheja hai.
Customer: To abhi jo hai.
Customer: Ab kis naam se aaya hoga? Kis naam se?
Executive: Dekhiye number hoga last mein 527 hoga.
Customer: Haan, haan bas aa gaya aa gaya aaya. Ruchi naam hai Ruchi haan. Bas usi pe usi ko link ko dabaiye.
Customer: Link.
Customer: Link pe na?
Executive: Haan haan link pe.
Customer: Ye jo likha hai na wo.
Customer: Https link bheje.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: To usi pe kar rahe hain kuch nahi ho raha.



Customer: Ek cheez bataiye https us pe okay karna hai?
Executive: Haan.
Executive: Dekhiye abhi ko bheja phir se dekhiye.
Customer: Haan haan bhej diye jo hai.
Executive: Haan usko dabaiye link pe.
Customer: Daba diye.
Executive: Usme aaya hoga join likha hoga.
Customer: Join.

Customer: Google com.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: O N T R E double M.
Executive: Haan usi pe aap join kariye niche join ka kuch button hoga neele rang ka.

Customer: Jo add likha hai us pe nahi kare na?
Executive: Haan nahi nahi.
Customer: Us pe nahi. To is pe to kar rahe hain jo hai. Daba ke rakhe tab hoga okay kar raha hu.
Executive: Nahi nahi ek baar bas daba dijiye.
Customer: Ek baar.
Executive: Ek baar touch karna nahi hai.


Customer: Hua?

Customer: Ho hi nahi raha hai. Ae idhar aao.
Customer: Tum sabko bhi hai chahe to tel lagana padta hai tumhara.

Customer: Jo aapne bheje hai na https.
Executive: Dekhiye jaise aap us link pe press karenge na jo link humne whatsapp kiya hai aapko.
Customer: Bhej dijiye.
Executive: Haan phir uske baad usme aapko join J O I N aise karke na neele rang mein neele rang mein wo show highlight kar gaya hoga. Us pe jab aap daba denge bas ek baar touch kar denge to tab aap meeting join karenge.
Customer: Wala nahi hai aa raha.
Customer: Ye safed mein hai neele mein nahi hai.
Executive: To usme jo bhi hai join ka option hoga.
Customer: Ask to aise kuch karke hai.
Customer: Ye to likh Google.com.
Customer: Phir se likhiye.
Executive: Phir se hum aapko phir se bhej denge.


Customer: Aap pehle apna whatsapp number batao.


Customer: Dekhiye aap us pe ek baar phir se use kariye usko.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Ek baar phir dekhiye usko. Aap dekhiye usme aapke aas paas koi hai jo thoda bata sake. Jaise link pe jab aap join karenge na to usme aapko ek ask to join kuch aise option aayega. Aap us pe tap karenge to wo aap join kar lenge.
Customer: Tap kar diya neela to ho gaya.
Executive: Dekhiye abhi abhi aapne nahi kiya. Jaise aap ask to join karenge na to hume pata chal jayega to phir hum aapko add kar lenge.
Customer: Haan haan to jo hai.
Customer: Us pe baar baar hum touch kar rahe hain lekin jo hai khul nahi raha.
Executive: Uske baad kuch aur option bhi aa raha hai kya usko tap karne ke baad?
Customer: Nahi aa raha.
Customer: Isme aa raha dekhiye https.
Executive: Wo to link hai.
Customer: Meet meeting meet google.com O N T R E double N PDF.
Executive: Haan to video haan usse wo link hai. Link pe.
Executive: Link pe aap dabayenge na tab jaake wo call shuru hogi.
Customer: Nahi hua hai.
Customer: Wo nahi raha jo hai hum.
Customer: Okay kar rahe hain koi usme nahi. Okay ho hi nahi raha ye.

Customer: Link baar baar kar rahe hain.
Customer: Ye aagya farman.

Customer: Nahi ho raha hai.

Customer: Abhi bhi nahi hua kya?
Customer: IndiaMART wale se kare ek likha hai. Hi I am thanks for speaking with our representative Subhkumari Singh. We are glad your quick feedback. How was your experience?
Executive: Haan wo to feedback ke liye aaya hoga. Uske upar ek jo link aaya hai na usme hum ek baar link abhi aapko phir se share kar denge. Uske upar jo hai likha hai invoice correction meet.
Customer: My previous invoice.
Executive: Abhi humne just abhi bheja. Abhi bheja aapko link wapas. Then main going whatsapp mein ja raha hu jo hai.


Customer: Aaya hai.

Customer: Open kyun nahi ho raha? Open nahi ho raha.

Customer: Is pe touch kar raha hu to open ho hi nahi raha.
Executive: Koi hai kya aagal bagal mein thoda sa madad kar dega.
Customer: Chaliye idhar aare suno na.

Customer: Link jo hai kar rahe link pe karo. Link.
Customer: Aa gaya?

Customer: Nahi ho raha hai.
Customer: Nahi ho raha ji.
Customer: Ho jana chahiye jab aap link pe tap karenge to aapko option aayega ki wifi ask to join to jaise aap us pe tap karenge na to hume pata chal jayega phir hum aapko yahan se add karenge.
Customer: Nahi kahan se aa rahi hai aana hai.
Customer: Link pe tap kariye link pe jo link abhi bheja hai humne https google.com karke.
Customer: Nahi meet meet.google.com.
Customer: Nahi aa raha ji.
Executive: Theek hai nahi aa raha hai to rukiye hum aapko thodi der baad phir se ek link share kar denge thodi der baad theek hai.
Customer: Haan theek hai ji theek hai.
Executive: Achcha to ye ek jab aap na kal aapne call kiya tha to ek concern generate ho gaya tha to jiske jiske regarding jo bhi aapko kal problem thi wo abhi aapki resolve hai jo add karna hai wo to hum add kar denge. Baki google meet pe jo abhi aapne bola na to wo abhi hum thodi der baad phir aapko link share karte hain.
Customer: Plus plus add.
Executive: Haan haan wo lag raha hai nahi ho raha hai. Jaise add kar raha hu to aapka naam aa raha hai.
Executive: Haan haan tumhara naam aa raha hai na to usko add kariye ek baar dekhiye.
Customer: New contact feed. Wo to wo to jo hai feed karne ko kar raha hai new contact google last name.

Executive: Rukiye hum phir abhi thodi der mein phir aapko link send phir se bhej denge.
Customer: Haan ji haan ji theek hai theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer unable to join video meeting.

- Customer having trouble clicking the link.



Resolution:

- Executive tried guiding customer to click link.

- Executive offered to resend the link.

- Executive confirmed previous issue was resolved.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will resend the link shortly.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Annoyed -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- video meet, link, whatsapp, join
